content: Hi can anyone give me a pointer on how to load US Core Profile in HAPI server. When I use the validate endpoint from HAPI to validate a valid US patient resource (a sample I took from HL7 website), it does not recognize us profile reference, and the race, ethnicity and birthplace.
I’ve tried pushing that IG from scripts and it’s pretty difficult to get right (at least for me). I haven’t tried it but you can tell HAPI to load an IG at start. See the application.yml
